attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: Bad app, glitchy and made my phone slow

attributes.title: review
attributes.review: It is an awful app. It honestly scares me and I would never let my kids use this app!!!

attributes.title: I wish I can give a lower rating ☺️
attributes.review: I hate👺 this app🤢 so much it ate🥰 my whole family 😩😩😩👁👄👁 what am I supposed😛 to do now 😾🙄🤨😰😿😓

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: I HATED every second of the app, it’s terrible. It’s slow, I’m pretty sure I caught a virus from it and overall very sucky app, 1/10 would NOT recommend to ANYONE EVER

attributes.title: It’s a bad app. A very, very bad app.
attributes.review: This is a bad app. A very, very bad app. The worst app of all apps in the creation of apps. It left a virus on my phone and I can’t get rid of it.

attributes.title: Not that great
attributes.review: Overall just not a great app really just wasn’t giving me the vibes I was looking for. Slightly confuses me how there is an Orange in office.

attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: It made my iPad glitchy and I had to take it to a shop to fix it 😞😡

attributes.title: Horrible!! This app is as bad as his presidency!🤢
attributes.review: Disgusting, not well planned, horrible president in general why would anyone want this app in the first place. Please educate yourself and vote blue!!!

attributes.title: This app is horrible🙄
attributes.review: I am deleting it right now and hope it’s deleted from the App Store ASAP.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Laggy, and absolutely terrible. Keeps on crashing and shut down my phone. ✨✨trash✨✨
